verses.verse: Then came <S%H935><s%> certain <S%H582><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to me, and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H582><s%> have set <S%H5927><s%> up their idols <S%H1544><s%> in their heart, <S%H3820><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the stumbling block <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> their face: <S%H6440><s%> should I be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of at all by them?

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to them, and say <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Every man <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that sets <S%H5927><s%> up his idols <S%H1544><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> and puts <S%H7760><s%> the stumbling block <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and comes <S%H935><s%> to the prophet; <S%H5030><s%> I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> him that comes <S%H935><s%> according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his idols; <S%H1544><s%>

That I may take <S%H8610><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their own heart, <S%H3820><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they are all <S%H3605><s%> estranged <S%H2114><s%> from me through their idols. <S%H1544><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Repent, <S%H7725><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> yourselves from your idols; <S%H1544><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> away your faces <S%H6440><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

For every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojournes <S%H1481><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which separates <S%H5144><s%> himself from me, and sets <S%H5927><s%> up his idols <S%H1544><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> and puts <S%H7760><s%> the stumbling block <S%H4383><s%> of his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and comes <S%H935><s%> to a prophet <S%H5030><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of him concerning me; I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> him by myself:

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that man, <S%H376><s%> and will make <S%H8074><s%> him a sign <S%H226><s%> and a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> and I will cut <S%H3772><s%> him off from the middle <S%H8432><s%> of my people; <S%H5971><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> be deceived <S%H6601><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> he has spoken <S%H1696><s%> a thing, <S%H1697><s%> I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have deceived <S%H6601><s%> that prophet, <S%H5030><s%> and I will stretch <S%H5186><s%> out my hand <S%H3027><s%> on him, and will destroy <S%H8045><s%> him from the middle <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall be even as the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of him that seeks <S%H1875><s%> to him;

That the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may go <S%H8582><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> astray <S%H8582><s%> from me, neither <S%H3808><s%> be polluted <S%H2930><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> their transgressions; <S%H6588><s%> but that they may be my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I may be their God, <S%H430><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> again to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> sins <S%H2398><s%> against me by trespassing <S%H4603><s%> grievously, <S%H4604><s%> then will I stretch <S%H5186><s%> out my hand <S%H3027><s%> on it, and will break <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of the bread <S%H3899><s%> thereof, and will send <S%H7971><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> on it, and will cut <S%H3772><s%> off man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it:

Though these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> and Job, <S%H347><s%> were in it, they should deliver <S%H5337><s%> but their own souls <S%H5315><s%> by their righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

If <S%H3863><s%> I cause noisome <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> and they spoil <S%H7921><s%> it, so <S%H3651><s%> that it be desolate, <S%H8077><s%> that no <S%H1097><s%> man may pass <S%H5674><s%> through because <S%H6440><s%> of the beasts: <S%H2416><s%>

Though these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> were in it, as I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> they shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> neither <S%H518><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H518><s%> daughters; <S%H1323><s%> they only <S%H905><s%> shall be delivered, <S%H5337><s%> but the land <S%H776><s%> shall be desolate. <S%H8077><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if I bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> on that land, <S%H776><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Sword, <S%H2719><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> through the land; <S%H776><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> that I cut <S%H3772><s%> off man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it:

Though these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> were in it, as I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> they shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> nor daughters, <S%H1323><s%> but they only <S%H905><s%> shall be delivered <S%H5337><s%> themselves.

Or <S%H176><s%> if I send <S%H7971><s%> a pestilence <S%H1698><s%> into <S%H413><s%> that land, <S%H776><s%> and pour <S%H8210><s%> out my fury <S%H2534><s%> on it in blood, <S%H1818><s%> to cut <S%H3772><s%> off from it man <S%H120><s%> and beast: <S%H929><s%>

Though Noah, <S%H5146><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> and Job <S%H347><s%>were in it, as I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> they shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> neither <S%H518><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H518><s%> daughter; <S%H1323><s%> they shall but deliver <S%H5337><s%> their own souls <S%H5315><s%> by their righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> How <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> I send <S%H7971><s%> my four <S%H702><s%> sore <S%H7451><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and the noisome <S%H7451><s%> beast, <S%H2416><s%> and the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> to cut <S%H3772><s%> off from it man <S%H120><s%> and beast? <S%H929><s%>

Yet, behold, <S%H2009><s%> therein shall be left <S%H3498><s%> a remnant <S%H6413><s%> that shall be brought <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H4163><s%> both sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> they shall come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to you, and you shall see <S%H7200><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> and their doings: <S%H5949><s%> and you shall be comforted <S%H5162><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> that I have brought <S%H935><s%> on Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> even concerning <S%H854><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I have brought <S%H935><s%> on it.

And they shall comfort <S%H5162><s%> you, when you see <S%H7200><s%> their ways <S%H1870><s%> and their doings: <S%H5949><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I have not done <S%H6213><s%> without <S%H2600><s%> cause <S%H2600><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I have done <S%H6213><s%> in it, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
